com.lukflug.panelstudio.mc12

Class MinecraftGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiScreen
        • com.lukflug.panelstudio.mc12.MinecraftGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiYesNoCallback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinecraftHUDGUI

    public abstract class MinecraftGUI
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiScreen
    Implementation of Minecraft's GuiScreen that renders a PanelStudio GUI.
